sect2.title: Introduction to GCC
sect2.para: The GCC package contains GNU compilers. This is useful for compiling programs written in Ada, C, C++, Fortran, Java and Objective C.

sect2.title: Installation of GCC
sect2.para:
If you plan to compile Ada, you will need to install GNAT temporarily to satisfy the circular dependency when you recompile
GCC to include Ada.

sect2.title: Return to Installation of GCC
sect2.para: Patch the source files with the following command:
Install GCC by running the following commands:

userinput.command: PATH_HOLD=$PATH && export PATH=/opt/gnat/bin:$PATH && cd gcc/ada && touch treeprs.ads [es]info.h nmake.ad[bs] && cd ../.. && mkdir ../gcc-build && cd ../gcc-build && CC=/usr/bin/gcc ../gcc-&gcc-version;/configure --prefix=/usr --enable-shared \ --enable-languages=c,c++,objc,f77,ada,java --enable-threads=posix \ --enable-__cxa_atexit --enable-clocale=gnu && make bootstrap && make -C gcc gnatlib_and_tools && make -k check && make install && ln -sf ../usr/bin/cpp /lib && ln -sf gcc /usr/bin/cc && ln -sf g77 /usr/bin/f77 && export PATH=$PATH_HOLD

sect2.para: You may remove the GNAT installation:

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: PATH_HOLD=$PATH: This command stores your current path before it's modified so that it can be restored after installation.
export PATH=/opt/gnat/bin:$PATH: This command allows the build to find GNAT's Ada compiler to build Ada.
touch treeprs.ads [es]info.h nmake.ad[bs]: This command creates necessary files for the Ada build. This step may be skipped if you don't want to compile the Ada front end.
CC=/usr/bin/gcc: This command works around the new PATH which puts GNAT 's gcc as the primary compiler.
--enable-languages=c,c++,objc,f77,ada,java: This command builds all available languages in the GCC package. You may modify this command to remove unwanted languages.
--enable-shared --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit: These commands are required to build the C++ libraries to published standards.
--enable-clocale=gnu: This command is a failsafe for incomplete locale data.
make gnatlib_and tools: This command completes the Ada build process. Skip this step if you have not enabled Ada as one of the languages.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GCC package contains c++, c++filt, cpp, g++, g77, gcc, gccbug, gcov, glob, gnat, gnatbind, gnatbl, gnatchop, gnatfind, gnatkr, gnatlink, gnatls, gnatmake, gnatprep, gnatpsta, gnatpsys, gnatxref and GCC libraries.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The programs and libraries whose descriptions are missing here have been described in the LFS GCC-&gcc-version; page.

sect3.title: g77
sect3.para: g77 is the Fortran compiler invoked by gcc.

sect3.title: add2line
sect3.para: add2line converts the ASCII form of the 2-line orbital elements in a file to binary form and appends them to the orbdata files.

sect3.title: gcov
sect3.para: gcov is a test coverage program.

sect3.title: gdb
sect3.para: gdb is the GNAT debugger.

sect3.title: gnatbind
sect3.para: gnatbind is used to bind compiled objects.

sect3.title: gnatbl
sect3.para: gnatbl is the Ada linker.

sect3.title: gnatchop
sect3.para: gnatchop is useful for renaming files to meet the standard Ada default file naming conventions.

sect3.title: gnatelim
sect3.para: gnatelim is used to detect and eliminate unused subprograms in an Ada partition.

sect3.title: gnatfind
sect3.para: gnatfind is the GNAT definition/use finder.

sect3.title: gnatgcc
sect3.para: gnatgcc is the compiler.

sect3.title: gnathtml.pl
sect3.para: gnathtml.pl converts Ada source files to HTML for viewing in Web browsers.

sect3.title: gnatkr
sect3.para: gnatkr is used to determine the crunched name for a given file, when crunched to a specified maximum length.

sect3.title: gnatlink
sect3.para: gnatlink is used to link programs and build an executable file.

sect3.title: gnatls
sect3.para: gnatls is the compiled unit browser.

sect3.title: gnatemake
sect3.para: gnatmake is an automatic make facility.

sect3.title: gnatmem
sect3.para: gnatmem is the GNAT utility that monitors dynamic allocation and deallocation activity in a program.

sect3.title: gnatprep
sect3.para: gnatprep is the GNAT external preprocessor.

sect3.title: gnatpsta
sect3.para: gnatpsta determines the values of all the relevant parameters in Standard and outputs to stdout.

sect3.title: gnatpsys
sect3.para: gnatpsys determines the values of all the relevant parameters in System and outputs to stdout.

sect3.title: gnatstub
sect3.para: gnatstub is a generator of body stubs.

sect3.title: gnatxref
sect3.para: gnatxref is the GNAT cross-referencer.

sect3.title: gvd
sect3.para: gvd is the GNU Visual Debugger.
